message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this lower price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $14,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer but unfortunately, I cannot meet you at $14,000. My maximum budget remains at $10,000. If you're willing to accommodate this, I'd be delighted to proceed with the purchase.
